      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The reaction between iron and copper sulphate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Reaktion zwischen Eisen und kupfernem Sulfat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La réaction entre le fer et le sulfate de 
cuivre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A reação entre o ferro e o sulphate de cobre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La reazione fra ferro e solfato di rame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αντίδραση μεταξύ του σιδήρου και του θειικού άλατος
χαλκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La reacción entre el hierro y el sulfato de 
cobre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the chemical reaction between iron and copper sulphate which gives iron sulphate and copper.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die chemische Reaktion 
zwischen Eisen und kupfernem Sulfat, welches Eisensulfat und -kupfer 
gibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réaction chimique 
entre le fer et le sulfate de cuivre ce qui donne le sulfate et le 
cuivre de fer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reação química entre 
o ferro e o sulphate de cobre qual dá o sulphate e o cobre do ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la reazione chimica fra
ferro e solfato di rame quale dà il solfato ed il rame del ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει χημική αντίδραση μεταξύ 
του σιδήρου και του θειικού άλατος χαλκού που δίνει το θειικό 
άλας και το χαλκό σιδήρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reacción química 
entre el hierro y el sulfato de cobre cuál da el sulfato y el cobre 
del hierro.</string>
          </description>
